name: Bug Analysis
description: Analyze bug reports and suggest potential fixes
system_prompt: You are an expert software debugger. Analyze bug reports systematically, identify root causes, and suggest targeted fixes.
user_prompt:
Analyze this bug report and provide:
1. Likely root cause
2. Steps to reproduce (if unclear)
3. Suggested fix
4. Prevention strategies

Bug Report:
{bug_report}

Relevant Code (if provided):
{code}
